titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 859) to prohibit the President from issuing moratoria on leasing and permitting energy and minerals on certain Federal land, and for other purposes.
Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 859) to prohibit the President from issuing moratoria on leasing and permitting energy and minerals on certain Federal land, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Roy. Petition No: 117-3.

bill.summary: This resolution sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 859 (Protecting American Energy Jobs Act).
